A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They could have done so much\, but it is just an incomprehensible pile of cr@p. Rian Johnson intentionally added plot twists and surprises\, but they were nonsensical: he could have added a fire-breathing unicorn to save the galaxy and it would not have been out of place. Previous character development was completely ignored and none acted in any kind of logical or believable way. This movie was not a disappointment: it has destroyed the franchise.
